name: pnp-list-formatting-funnel-chart-tile
title: Funnel Chart
shortDescription: This sample displays funnel chart stages in a modern dashboard-style tile card with proportional widths and customizable colors.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to render a funnel chart inside a tile card using SharePoint JSON formatting. Each stage is represented as a colored bar, with the width proportional to its numeric value. The sample is ideal for visualizing pipelines such as Leads → Qualified → Proposal → Closed.

thumbnails.alt: Tile card showing a funnel chart with four proportional colored bars

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
